languages.text: "Какая напрасная трата... Можно было бы заставить их биться за право жить, а последнего медленно умертвить, наслаждаясь его отчаянием".
languages.translation_comment: Palace of Justice, after judging the RT's subjects. Watching other executions take place.

traits.locale_text: "Какая напрасная трата... Можно было бы заставить их биться за право жить, а последнего медленно умертвить, наслаждаясь его отчаянием".

languages.text: "What a waste... You could have let them fight for the right to live — and then killed whoever remained, slowly, basking in their despair."
languages.translation_comment: Palace of Justice, after judging the RT's subjects. Watching other executions take place.
languages.original_text: "Какая напрасная трата... Можно было бы заставить их биться за право жить, а последнего медленно умертвить, наслаждаясь его отчаянием".

traits.locale_text: "What a waste... You could have let them fight for the right to live — and then killed whoever remained, slowly, basking in their despair."
"What a waste... You could have let them fight for the right to live — and then killed whoever remained, slowly, basking in their despair."
"What a waste... You could have let them fight for the right to live — and then killed whoever remained, slowly, basking in their despair."
"What a waste... You could have let them fight for the right to live — and then killed whoever remained, slowly, basking in their despair."
"What a waste... You could have let them fight for the right to live — and then killed whoever remained, slowly, basking in their despair."
"What a waste... You could have let them fight for the right to live — and then killed whoever remained, slowly, basking in their despair."

languages.text: 「なんて無駄なことを…生きる権利をかけて争わせることだってできただろうに。そして最後に残った者を、絶望に浸らせながらゆっくり殺せばよかったのだ」
languages.original_text: "What a waste... You could have let them fight for the right to live — and then killed whoever remained, slowly, basking in their despair."

traits.locale_text: 「なんて無駄なことを…生きる権利をかけて争わせることだってできただろうに。そして最後に残った者を、絶望に浸らせながらゆっくり殺せばよかったのだ」

languages.text: "Was für eine Vergeudung ... Ihr hättet sie um das Recht zu leben kämpfen lassen können … und dann die Überlebenden töten, langsam, ihre Verzweiflung richtig auskostend."
languages.original_text: "What a waste... You could have let them fight for the right to live — and then killed whoever remained, slowly, basking in their despair."

traits.locale_text: "Was für eine Vergeudung ... Ihr hättet sie um das Recht zu leben kämpfen lassen können … und dann die Überlebenden töten, langsam, ihre Verzweiflung richtig auskostend."

languages.text: « Quel gâchis... Vous auriez pu les laisser se battre pour le droit de vivre, et ensuite, tuer les survivants lentement en savourant leur désespoir. »
languages.original_text: "What a waste... You could have let them fight for the right to live — and then killed whoever remained, slowly, basking in their despair."

traits.locale_text: « Quel gâchis... Vous auriez pu les laisser se battre pour le droit de vivre, et ensuite, tuer les survivants lentement en savourant leur désespoir. »

languages.text: «Qué desperdicio... Al menos podríais hacer que luchasen por el derecho a vivir... y luego matar a los que queden, muy despacio y deleitándoos con su desesperación».
languages.original_text: "What a waste... You could have let them fight for the right to live — and then killed whoever remained, slowly, basking in their despair."

traits.locale_text: «Qué desperdicio... Al menos podríais hacer que luchasen por el derecho a vivir... y luego matar a los que queden, muy despacio y deleitándoos con su desesperación».

languages.text: “这真是太浪费了……你们本可以让他们为了生存互相厮杀，之后再慢慢杀死那些活下来的人，充分享受他们的绝望。”
languages.original_text: "What a waste... You could have let them fight for the right to live — and then killed whoever remained, slowly, basking in their despair."

traits.locale_text: “这真是太浪费了……你们本可以让他们为了生存互相厮杀，之后再慢慢杀死那些活下来的人，充分享受他们的绝望。”

languages.text: "Pek yazık. Yaşama hakları için savaşmalarına izin vermeli, sonra kalanların canlarını yavaşça, tadına vara vara almalıydın."
languages.original_text: "What a waste... You could have let them fight for the right to live — and then killed whoever remained, slowly, basking in their despair."

traits.locale_text: "Pek yazık. Yaşama hakları için savaşmalarına izin vermeli, sonra kalanların canlarını yavaşça, tadına vara vara almalıydın."

languages.original_text: "What a waste... You could have let them fight for the right to live — and then killed whoever remained, slowly, basking in their despair."
